minions.name: Space Knight
minions.description: Talent: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. You may draw one action from the revealed cards. Return the rest in any order

minions.name: Space Prince
minions.description: Talent: Play an extra action that directly increases the power of one of your minions

minions.name: Scoundrel
minions.description: Talent: Move this minion and another one of your minions here to another base

minions.name: Walking Carpet
minions.description: Special: Before this base scores, if you are not winning, you may play an action that directly increases the power of this minion

minions.name: Ghost Knight
minions.description: Ongoing: This minion cannot be destroyed. Your other minions here have +2 power

minions.name: Annoying Alien
minions.description: Talent: Name a minion. All minions here with that name get -2 power until the start of your next turn

minions.name: Alien Guru
minions.description: Ongoing: Once per turn, after you play an action that directly increases a minion's power, you may also place a +1 power counter on it

minions.name: Astro Robot
minions.description: Destroy an action played on this base or on a minion here

minions.name: Mannersbot
minions.description: Talent: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an action, draw it, otherwise return it

minions.name: Pupoks
minions.description: Talent: Lose 1 VP to reveal the top three cards of your deck and draw them. You may play one of them as an extra card

actions.name: Laser Sword
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +1 power and is not affected by other players' minions

actions.name: Block the Probe
actions.description: Choose a minion. It gains +2 power until the end of the turn. Special: You may play this card before a base scores

actions.name: Use the Fours
actions.description: One of your minions gains +4 power until the end of the turn

actions.name: Yield to Rage
actions.description: One of your minions gains +2 power until the end of the turn. Play an extra action

actions.name: Recycle the Trash
actions.description: Shuffle up to two actions from your discard pile into your deck

actions.name: Hidden Base
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if you have a minion here, draw a card

actions.name: It's a Trap!
actions.description: Special: Before a base scores, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal an action. You may draw it or play it immediately. Shuffle the unused cards into your deck

actions.name: Prepare for Battle
actions.description: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Place one into your hand and the other on the bottom of your deck
